Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Oceancrest Avenue, north of the elven shrine.
Room.LongDescription: The massive elven shrine to the south is the Holy Order of Corellon Larethian, the elven god of all that is and will be. There are many races of elves scattered throughout the land, but almost all of them worship Corellon Larethian, with the exception of the drow (dark) elves.
